Package edu.ncsu.csc.Galant.graph.component

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    Edge
    Edge graph object.
    EdgeState
    The state of an Edge, used akin to a frame in an animation.
    Graph
    Stores all Nodes and Edges for use in graph algorithms.
    GraphElement
    Abstract class containing graph element manipulation methods
    GraphLayout  
    GraphState
    Stores the current state of the graph for iterating through the animation.
    Node
    Represents node entities as elements of a graph.
    NodeState
    The state of an Node, used akin to a frame in an animation.
